programme.title: Live: WWE Friday Night SmackDown
programme.desc: The Superstars of World Wrestling Entertainment display their skills and athleticism in weekly episodic programming, as scores are settled and enduring rivalries play out in the ring.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry struggles to find balance with his new human form.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry struggles to find balance with his new human form.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry and Heather reunite, but their relationship is more complicated than ever.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry struggles to find balance with his new human form.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore must assist Newt Scamander and his partners as Grindelwald begins to lead an army to eliminate all Muggles.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione return for a third term at Hogwarts. But Harry's fate, and that of the entire community of wizards, looks bleak when the infamous Sirius Black escapes from prison.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione return for a third term at Hogwarts. But Harry's fate, and that of the entire community of wizards, looks bleak when the infamous Sirius Black escapes from prison.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: During Harry's fourth year at Hogwarts a competition will be held between three schools of wizardry, and contestants will be magically chosen for the very dangerous event.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: A summer has passed since Harry's encounter with the Dark Lord. With the wizard community in peril the future of magic may depend on Harry and a secret society known as The Order of the Phoenix.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: While Death Eaters emboldened by the return of Lord Voldemort wreak havoc in both the Muggle and Wizarding worlds, Harry suspects new dangers lie within Hogwarts.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: In the first part of the seventh and final adventure, Harry, Ron and Hermione set out on their perilous mission to destroy the secret to Voldemort's immortality and destruction: the Horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Making their final stand upon the ramparts of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione face their greatest foe and make the ultimate sacrifice on their journey.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry struggles to find balance with his new human form.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a missing 16-year-old girl is found in a deserted building, she tells the skeptical detectives that three men in uniform kept her there for several days.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate a cellist's (Tamara Gorski) orchestra conductor (Michael Nader) after she is brutally attacked in her apartment.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Assistant DA Cabot jeopardizes the detectives' careers and her own when she exceeds legal limits to collect evidence against a serial child-abuser.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the detectives find a baby's finger in a rape victim's purse, their investigation widens to encompass three generations of women harboring secrets.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate to determine whether a 22-year-old with Down syndrome is pregnant as a result of rape, as her mother contends.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry and Heather reunite, but their relationship is more complicated than ever.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry struggles to find balance with his new human form.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a criminology student is raped and murdered, detectives hunt for a suspect with an expert knowledge of forensic medicine.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a missing 16-year-old girl is found in a deserted building, she tells the skeptical detectives that three men in uniform kept her there for several days.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler have a suspect (Alfred Molina) but not enough evidence when a serial rapist preys on illegal immigrant women, and Tracy Kibre (Bebe Neuwirth) is brought in to work on the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: While searching for a child molester who has abducted three young children orphaned by Hurricane Katrina, detectives learn that the suspect also possesses a deadly strain of anthrax.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Benson goes under cover to combat terrorist activities; a victim refuses a rape kit.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The life of a law-abiding engineer (Robin Williams) goes terribly wrong, leading him to challenge authority and to urge others to do so as well.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the body of a 14-year-old girl is found in the Hudson River, Benson and Stabler think she was smuggled into the country by sex traffickers; in an attempt to identify her, Benson poses as a madam.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Stabler's former partner (Sharon Stone) is put on the case when two young sisters are killed in a fire.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler investigate when a woman scheduled to testify in a high-profile rape case is murdered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The squad makes a quick arrest when a student is raped at gunpoint in her apartment, but the defense attorney works to undermine their police work.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate a rape of an actress during a theater production.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man goes on a killing spree, but he has links to a prostitute that Benson encountered in an earlier investigation, so the FBI contacts SVU for information.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU is called in to help investigate a wave of hate crimes on Christmas Eve; Rollins catches up with an old flame.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: We peel back the layers on the Premier League's most iconic managerial rivalries; battles that shaped eras, defined clubs, and captivated fans around the world. From the fierce mind games between Arsène Wenger and Sir Alex Ferguson, to the emotional explosion of Kevin Keegan's title-chasing Newcastle.

programme.desc: Ahead of the 2025 Tour de France, we take an A to Z look at cycling's oldest and most prestigious Grand Tour.

programme.desc: The 2025 Tour de France begins with a 184km route around Lille Metropole. Which of the 23 teams will get off to a flying start?

programme.desc: A look back at the 1993 UEFA Champions League final between Marseille and AC Milan in Munich. Marseille were looking to become the first French side to lift the European title.

programme.desc: Ultimate Pool action from Group 5 of the Pairs Cup, featuring Chris Day and Carl Morris, Jez Graham and Jordan Graham, and Simon Fitzsimmons and Dave Hunt.

programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Brentford face Arsenal at Gtech Community Stadium. Brentford have lost just one of their last 10 home league games.

programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Newcastle United face Manchester United at St James' Park. Man United are winless in their last three league games against Newcastle.
